code: import*as React from'react';import{TitledSection}from'../common/TiledSection';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';export var InternationTravel=function InternationTravel(_ref){var totalData=_ref.totalData;var yes=totalData.filter(function(a){return a.internationalTravel==='Yes';}).length;var no=totalData.filter(function(a){return a.internationalTravel==='No';}).length;var unknown=totalData.length-yes-no;var data={datasets:[{data:[yes,no,unknown],backgroundColor:'#FF6384'}],labels:['Yes','No','Unknown']};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TitledSection,{title:"International travels"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Bar,{data:data,width:400,height:400,options:{responsive:false,maintainAspectRatio:true,legend:{display:false},scales:{yAxes:[{ticks:{beginAtZero:true,fontColor:'white'}}],xAxes:[{ticks:{fontColor:'white'}}]}}}));};
